mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inv_id AS "invId.id", i.name AS "invInfo.name", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", sku.name AS "skuInfo.name", a.inv_type AS "invType", a.stock_qty AS "stockQty", a.s_ord_qty AS "sOrdQty", a.trans_in_qty AS "transInQty", a.trans_out_qty AS "transOutQty", a.cust_id AS "customer.id", s.name AS "customer.name", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info sku ON a.sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info i ON a.inv_id = i.id LEFT JOIN sys_office s ON a.cust_id = s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_inventory_sku( id, inv_id, sku_id, inv_type, stock_qty, s_ord_qty, trans_in_qty, trans_out_qty, cust_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{invInfo.id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{invType}, #{stockQty}, #{sOrdQty}, #{transInQty}, #{transOutQty}, #{customer.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_inventory_sku SET inv_id = #{invInfo.id}, sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, inv_type = #{invType}, stock_qty = #{stockQty}, s_ord_qty = #{sOrdQty}, trans_in_qty = #{transInQty}, trans_out_qty = #{transOutQty}, cust_id = #{customer.id}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
